effect.scarlet-violet: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the-teal-mask: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.the-indigo-disk: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.
